thread.title: The Deck at the National Theatre pledges support for London Breakfast Meetings Week
thread.title_full: The Deck at the National Theatre pledges support for London Breakfast Meetings Week

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: The Deck at the National Theatre pledges support for London Breakfast Meetings Week
text:
The Deck at the National Theatre pledges support for London Breakfast Meetings Week The Deck at the National Theatre pledges support for London Breakfast Meetings Week Details Category: Venues & Events   15:45 London Breakfast Meetings Week is back for 2015, and exclusive rooftop venue The Deck is helping to put breakfast meetings on the menu. Running from 5 – 9 October the week is dedicated to championing breakfast events and encouraging venues and event bookers to utilise the opportunities for increased revenue that an early morning event can bring.. 
The Deck has announced its support for the week and pledges to promote the benefits of hosting breakfast events in the coming months. The Deck will also be hosting a London Breakfast Meetings Week open morning on Tuesday 6 October, showcasing a variety of inspiring breakfast ideas with full details to be announced soon. Commenting on why they are supporting the week Charley Taylor-Smith, head of hospitality events and commercial business development at The Deck says “We have seen first-hand the benefits of opening up our venue for breakfast events, and we are committed to backing London Breakfast Meetings Week and helping other venues do the same. We intend to support and promote the week and our open morning will highlight all the possibilities available to venues considering holding a breakfast event. We look forward to uniting with other London venues and being part of this joint venture.” Any venues looking to be involved in London Breakfast Meetings Week can now request a dedicated toolkit with top-tips, resources and guides designed to help venues effectively take part in the week. To get the toolkit and for more information on London Breakfast Meetings Week please visit www.breakfastmeetingsweek.com Related articles
